body.name: Simmons Kids SlumberTime Paloma 4-in-1 Convertible Baby Crib - Greenguard Gold Certified, Rustic Mist
body.stockDetail: Only 2 left in stock (more on the way).
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 3 hrs 22 mins
features: CONVERTIBLE CRIB: Converts from a crib to a toddler bed, daybed and full size bed with headboard & footboard (Daybed/Toddler Guardrail Kit #328725 and Full Size Bed Rails #0050-001 sold separately)
GROWS WITH BABY: The 3 position mattress height adjustment on this crib allows you to lower the mattress as your baby begins to sit or stand.Care & Cleaning: Spot or Wipe Clean
BUILT TO LAST: Strong and sturdy wood construction helps create a dream nursery where you’ll spend plenty of Mommy and Me/Daddy and Me time Easy assembly

WE PUT YOUR BABY’S SAFETY FIRST: This crib is JPMA certified to meet or exceed all safety standards set by ASTM Tested for lead and other toxic elements to meet or exceed government and ASTM safety standards
SIZE: 57”W x 31.5”D x 47.5”H Fits standard size crib mattress (sold separately) Cuna para bebé que se convierte en una cama para niño/niña, sofá cama y cama de tamaño completo
body.description: Rustic craftsmanship brings warmth and character to the Paloma 4-in-1 Convertible Crib from Simmons Kids. Gorgeously made from strong and sturdy pine, this crib features a hand-distressed, soft texture finish that makes each piece one of a kind. Impressive details such as crown molding, intricate trim and a full panel headboard add to its charming style. Built to the highest safety standards, the Paloma 4-in-1 Crib is JPMA certified, so you can be comfortably secure in the selection of baby's crib. For additional convenience, this versatile crib features a three-position mattress height adjustment that allows you to lower the mattress as your baby grows, plus it converts into a toddler bed, daybed and full size bed when your child is ready. Pair it with the Paloma 4 Drawer Dresser with Changing Top (sold separately) to complete your nursery. Due to varying wood grains and variations in the hand-applied finish, product might appear slightly different than those shown on site. Producing the finest furniture for over 80 years, Simmons Kids has always been committed to the safety of every family. All Simmons Kids cribs are JPMA certified, and are tested above and beyond industry standards.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Simmons Kids SlumberTime Paloma 4 Drawer Dresser with Changing Top Simmons Kids SlumberTime Paloma 4-in-1 Convertible Crib ComforPedic from Beautyrest Contoured Changing Pad Middleton Glider, Cream Impressive and substantial, the Paloma 4 Drawer Dresser with Changing Top from Simmons Kids instantly brings warmth to any space Rustic craftsmanship brings warmth and character to the Paloma 4-in-1 Convertible Crib from Simmons Kids The ComforPedic from Beautyrest Contoured Changing Pad will instantly transform any flat surface into a healthy, safe and comfy changing area for baby. Give your stylish nursery a worthy throne with the on-trend Middleton Upholstered Glider from Delta Children

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, Study Crib
reviews.reviewText: First one arrived damaged. I contacted Amazon and they promptly sent another and had the damaged one picked up. Second one was perfect!Item is HEAVY, so if you are a female or expecting plan on getting help lifting it.It is beautiful, sturdy, heavy duty, color (rustic gray) looks like the image shown.NOTE: Keep in mind this doesn't come with rails for transitioning to toddler, or full size bed. You have to purchase those separately from Delta's website. You get the wooden headboard, footboard, and all necessary parts needed to use as a crib (only) in this box.If you want other pieces of nursery furniture (changing table, dresser, etc.,) in this color, you will not be able to purchaae them right away...manufacturer website says expected back in stock March 2022...? That's aggravating, but this didn't alter my review, I just wanted to share in case that's a deal breaker for anyone thinking of purchasing this crib.Overall, it is stunning, sturdy, and should hold up for many years to come.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2022
reviews.reviewText: These came with AMAZINGLY easy-to-follow instructions, with all parts labeled. It took probably less than 30 min for my husband and I to assemble (used a power tool for screwing in pieces too). We got the color rustic grey, and it was accurately pictured and exactly what we expected. It came well packaged with no damage. (We were disappointed that there wasn’t a matching dresser available online from the same company, but it matched our Evlour Double Dresser in Smokey Brushed Grey PERFECTLY!) would definitely recommend. It is a good looking crib, in a neutral brown-gray color

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So happy we bought this!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely adore this crib! We spent months shopping for the perfect crib that wasn't crazy expensive before finding this gem. Everything we looked at just seemed flimsy to me and wouldn't be something we'd want for him to use as he gets older. But this crib is definitely sturdy; the wood is solid and doesn't feel like plastic (like some cribs do), and it doesn't wiggle or move at all when you shake it. The color is fabulous, and is just the perfect rustic look we were wanting. It'll definitely be a nice bed once converted to a full size when it's time.We are so happy we ordered this!(Especially while it was on sale!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: It had great directions that made it incredibly easy to put together. My husband handled it well in an hour (and he's not exactly the handy-man type). At Target this same crib is sold for 429.99, and I just could not imagine paying that kind of money for it. Don't get me wrong, it's a beautiful piece. But it's nothing to write home to mom about. for that kind of money. Luckily Amazon has it on sale for $299.99--so the value seems relatively appropriate. The sturdiness thus far seems good, but I won't be able to say much else until we use it with the baby.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for the newest baby and it came quickly and is a pretty true to the picture as far as color. We did notice that you have to go through the actual company for the toddler rail if that's something you are interested in, which could be a downside. Once we found the directions online, it was easy to put together. However, directions inside the box would have been a bit easier!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Really love the tickness of the wood and sturdiness. It took my husband less than an hour to assemble. The color of the crib is more like a rustic grayish and bit brownish which I loved 🥰

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the color, assembled very quickly and easily!
reviews.reviewText: We got this crib in the Rustic Driftwood color and it looks great in our house. The crib is sturdy and I feel like it is a great safe option for our new little girl. We are excited about using it as the toddler bed eventually and love that it can grow with her. My husband had this unboxed and completely set up in 25 minutes, which was very convenient!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars friend loved it
reviews.reviewText: lovely crib but came with some flaws - chipped piece of wood (still usable though so it’s whatevs)
